content: Scan and analyze entire codebase structure for optimization opportunities
Optimize Python code with async/await, list comprehensions, and generators
Optimize bash scripts for parallel execution and reduced subprocess calls
Implement memory optimization with pools and reduced allocations
Optimize I/O operations with batching and async patterns
Improve algorithm time/space complexity throughout codebase
Add intelligent caching layers where beneficial
Implement parallel processing to utilize all CPU cores effectively
Identify and eliminate code redundancy across codebase
Apply Intel Meteor Lake specific optimizations
